channel.title: automotive industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in automotive industry on FinanClub

item.title: GM
item.description: score:20 Chances: General Motors is seeking to recover more than $100 million from the city of San Francisco, which could potentially lead to a positive outcome for the company’s finances. Citigroup has named General Motors as one of its top stock picks for 2024, indicating potential for outperformance in the new year.

item.title: RIVN
item.description: score:-79 Chances: Rivian Automotive is looking to challenge Tesla, Ford, and General Motors with its adventure-styled electric vehicles. RIVN shares surged after Tesla began initial deliveries of its Cybertruck, indicating increasing interest in electric-pickup trucks. Risks: Rivian let go of 20 members of its long-range battery cell development team, including the company’s lead cell engineer and former Tesla senior manager.
